Structure# SubscriptionOptionSection

StoreKitSwiftUIiOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 18.0+visionOS 2.0+watchOS 11.0+

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
struct SubscriptionOptionSection<Header, Content, Footer> where Header : View, Content : StoreContent, Footer : View
```
